subject: Football
Drugs (Pharmaceuticals)
lead_paragraph: The former Oakland Raiders quarterback JaMarcus Russell, chosen No. 1 over all in the 2007 N.F.L.  draft, was arrested in Mobile, Ala., and charged with possession of codeine syrup.
snippet: The former Oakland Raiders quarterback JaMarcus Russell, chosen No. 1 over all in the 2007 N.F.L.  draft, was arrested in Mobile, Ala., and charged with possession of codeine syrup.
